inclusion.criterion: Type 1 diabetic patient with ischemia in the lower extremities determined from conventional clinical measurements
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Diabetic foot ulcer with a Wagner score of 0-2
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: If subject does not apply to the MR safety rules
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Has a planed amputation of a lower extremity as part of treatment
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Diabetic foot ulcer with a Wagner score of 3-5
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has tinea pedis infection, no underlying disease such as DM. Smokes and drinks moderately.
